entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
